title: Sokoban Level 1c
data:
**Sokoban Level 1c** is a new possible map for [Sokoban](/wiki/Sokoban "Sokoban") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [SpliceHack-Rewrite](/wiki/SpliceHack-Rewrite "SpliceHack-Rewrite"), and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). In Hack'EM, the level map is named **"Mirror Hall"**. It has 10 [boulders](/wiki/Boulder "Boulder") and 9 [pits](/wiki/Pit "Pit"), leaving 1 spare boulder.

In UnNetHack, this level may be flipped horizontally or vertically like all Sokoban levels.

```
     -------                  0 boulder
     |..|..|     --------     ^ pit
------..0..--- ---......---   > starting position/downstairs
|......---...| |?.........|   < upstairs
|.|.|...0..|.--|........|.--- ? scroll of earth
|.|0--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...| # iron bars
|.....00|00..>.^^^^^^^^^..<.|
|.|0--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...0..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..0..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------
```

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [2 Next level](#Next_level)

  - [2.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [2.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)

## Strategy

The following solution may not be very fast or organized. Improvements welcome. Like all Sokoban levels it can be solved without making any boulders 'stick'.

All boulders are replaced by letters so they can be referred to. Moving the boulders is shortened to **r** for right, **l** for left, **u** for up, **d** for down. An asterisk is used to denote the last move filled a pit (and thus removed the boulder from the game). So "**N** ddrr\*" means move boulder **N** two times down and two times to the right into a pit.

This is the starting position. First, push the closest boulder into a pit:

```
     -------                  F d
     |..|..|     --------     G rrrr r*
------..A..--- ---......---
|......---...| |?.........|
|.|.|...B..|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.....DE|FG..@.^^^^^^^^^..<.|
|.|H--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...I..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..J..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------
```

Open up the way to the back area:

```
     -------                  B ll
     |..|..|     --------     D d
------..A..--- ---......---   B rrrr ddrr rrrr*
|......---...| |?.........|
|.|.|...B..|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.....DE|....>@.^^^^^^^^..<.|
|.|H--..|F.|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...I..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..J..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------
```

This makes a few more boulders very easy to deal with:

```
     -------                  A rrdd ddrr rrrr r*
     |..|..|     --------     E uurr rddr rrrr rrr*
------..A..--- ---......---   D uuur rrrd drrr rrrr rr*
|......---...| |?.........|   F uuur ddrr rrrr rrrr*
|.|.|......|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|......E|....>.@.^^^^^^^..<.|
|.|H--D.|F.|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...I..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..J..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------
```

The final boulders finish this level:

```
     -------                  J rruu uurr rrrr rrrr r*
     |..|..|     --------     I rruu rrrr rrrr rrrr*
------.....--- ---......---   H urrr rddr rruu rrrr rrrr rrrr r*
|......---...| |?.........|
|.|.|......|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.......|....>.....@.^^^..<.|
|.|H--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...I..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..J..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------
```

Pick up the two [scrolls of earth](/wiki/Scroll_of_earth "Scroll of earth") and check under the final boulder in case an item happens to be underneath.

```
     -------
     |..|..|     --------
------.....--- ---......---
|......---...| |?.........|
|.|.|......|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.......|....>........@...<.|
|.|.--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|......|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------.....--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------
```

## Next level

### SLASH'EM

- [Sokoban Level 2c](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_1h "Sokoban Level 1h")
- [Sokoban Level 2d](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_1j "Sokoban Level 1j")
- [Sokoban Level 2e](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_1k "Sokoban Level 1k")
- [Sokoban Level 2f](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_1l "Sokoban Level 1l")
- [Sokoban Level 2g](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_1n "Sokoban Level 1n")

### UnNetHack

UnNetHack's Sokoban branch has only three levels per game, collapsing the 'second' levels into the first floor, so the first level leads straight to the pool of third levels:

- [Sokoban Level 3a](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3a "Sokoban Level 3a")
- [Sokoban Level 3b](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3b "Sokoban Level 3b")
- [Sokoban Level 3c](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3c "Sokoban Level 3c")
- [Sokoban Level 3d](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3d "Sokoban Level 3d")
- [Sokoban Level 3e](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3e "Sokoban Level 3e")
- [Sokoban Level 3f](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3f "Sokoban Level 3f")
- [Sokoban Level 3g](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3g "Sokoban Level 3g")
- [Sokoban Level 3h](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3h "Sokoban Level 3h")
- [Sokoban Level 3i](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3i "Sokoban Level 3i")
- [Sokoban Level 3j](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3j "Sokoban Level 3j")
- [Sokoban Level 3k](/wiki/Sokoban_Level_3k "Sokoban Level 3k")

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Sokoban Level 1c

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Sokoban Level 1c is a new possible map for Sokoban that appears in SLASH'EM, UnNetHack, EvilHack, SpliceHack-Rewrite, and Hack'EM. In Hack'EM, the level map is named "Mirror Hall". It has 10 boulders and 9 pits, leaving 1 spare boulder.

In UnNetHack, this level may be flipped horizontally or vertically like all Sokoban levels. 

     -------                  0 boulder
     |..|..|     --------     ^ pit
------..0..--- ---......---   > starting position/downstairs
|......---...| |?.........|   < upstairs
|.|.|...0..|.--|........|.--- ? scroll of earth
|.|0--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...| # iron bars
|.....00|00..>.^^^^^^^^^..<.|
|.|0--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...0..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..0..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------

Contents

  • 1 Strategy
  • 2 Next level
    • 2.1 SLASH'EM
    • 2.2 UnNetHack

Strategy

The following solution may not be very fast or organized. Improvements welcome. Like all Sokoban levels it can be solved without making any boulders 'stick'.

All boulders are replaced by letters so they can be referred to. Moving the boulders is shortened to r for right, l for left, u for up, d for down. An asterisk is used to denote the last move filled a pit (and thus removed the boulder from the game). So "N ddrr*" means move boulder N two times down and two times to the right into a pit.

This is the starting position. First, push the closest boulder into a pit: 

     -------                  F d
     |..|..|     --------     G rrrr r*
------..A..--- ---......---
|......---...| |?.........|
|.|.|...B..|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.....DE|FG..@.^^^^^^^^^..<.|
|.|H--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...I..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..J..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------

Open up the way to the back area: 

     -------                  B ll
     |..|..|     --------     D d
------..A..--- ---......---   B rrrr ddrr rrrr*
|......---...| |?.........|
|.|.|...B..|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.....DE|....>@.^^^^^^^^..<.|
|.|H--..|F.|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...I..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..J..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------

This makes a few more boulders very easy to deal with: 

     -------                  A rrdd ddrr rrrr r*
     |..|..|     --------     E uurr rddr rrrr rrr*
------..A..--- ---......---   D uuur rrrd drrr rrrr rr*
|......---...| |?.........|   F uuur ddrr rrrr rrrr*
|.|.|......|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|......E|....>.@.^^^^^^^..<.|
|.|H--D.|F.|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...I..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..J..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------

The final boulders finish this level: 

     -------                  J rruu uurr rrrr rrrr r*
     |..|..|     --------     I rruu rrrr rrrr rrrr*
------.....--- ---......---   H urrr rddr rruu rrrr rrrr rrrr r*
|......---...| |?.........|
|.|.|......|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.......|....>.....@.^^^..<.|
|.|H--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|...I..|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------..J..--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------

Pick up the two scrolls of earth and check under the final boulder in case an item happens to be underneath. 

     -------
     |..|..|     --------
------.....--- ---......---
|......---...| |?.........|
|.|.|......|.--|........|.---
|.|C--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.......|....>........@...<.|
|.|.--..|..|...-#-#-#-#--...|
|.|.|......|.--|........|.---
|......---...| |?.........|
------.....--- ---......---
     |..|..|     --------
     -------

Next level

SLASH'EM

  • Sokoban Level 2c
  • Sokoban Level 2d
  • Sokoban Level 2e
  • Sokoban Level 2f
  • Sokoban Level 2g

UnNetHack

UnNetHack's Sokoban branch has only three levels per game, collapsing the 'second' levels into the first floor, so the first level leads straight to the pool of third levels:

  • Sokoban Level 3a
  • Sokoban Level 3b
  • Sokoban Level 3c
  • Sokoban Level 3d
  • Sokoban Level 3e
  • Sokoban Level 3f
  • Sokoban Level 3g
  • Sokoban Level 3h
  • Sokoban Level 3i
  • Sokoban Level 3j
  • Sokoban Level 3k
